phrs.translation: 四面体, 有四面的, 四面的, 四面角
四面角, 四面体角, 正切角
四面体元, 四面体单元
四面曲面, 四面体曲面

sentences.sentence: Only a fraction of the A ions are in tetrahedral sites.
sentences.translation: 只有一部分A离子处在四面体的位置上。

sentences.sentence: The researchers poured tetrahedral dice into containers which they shook until completely full.
sentences.translation: 研究者把许多四面体状的骰子放进一个容器，晃动容器直至装满。

sentences.sentence: His work with tetrahedral kites led to the development of this flying machine a few years before 1910.
sentences.translation: 1910年前，他在四面体风筝方面的研究，导致了这艘飞行器的开发。
